title: how do i go back to the old lol
body: i cant handle this new beta anymore its not ready to be played if i'm not lagging i'm disconnecting or bugging out where my character doesn't move for about 20 seconds at least 10 times a game and i can click through abilities and nothing happens can anyone help me how to revert back to the old sever

replies.body:
You can revert to the legacy client still. 

\> Open the client
\> Click 'Launch legacy client' in the lower right hand corner (it's in yellow text)
\> Log in as usual!

Old client aint any good either, i keep getting frozen in my lobbies even I have a brand new gaming laptop and run a solid 30 ping almost every other game I'll disconnect from a lobby or the game and it fucks me up when its leagues clients fault.

lagging is the smallest problem that i can handle its the discounecting and the huge bug 
where my charector stands there while i see him getting killed and then throws all abilities all at one after 20 seconds
